item.description:
The Museum of Fine Art's David and Roberta Logie Department
of Textile and Fashion Arts has graciously invited to give us a tour of their department.

In addition, they will be giving us an up close look at pieces from certain collections and discussing some of the services and resources they provide.

The tour will take place on Feb 24 from 5:30pm to 7:00pm.

Due to construction, we have to meet at the side entrance and from there we will walk to the
staff entrance.

Space is limited to 15 people, so make sure to RSVP as soon as possible.

If you have any questions, please feel free to email me, oluokun.j@gmail.com

For more information about the department, please visit the below link
http://www.mfa.org/co...
item.name: Tour of the MFA Fashion & Textile Department
